channel.title: Romance on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Romance on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Looking for a partner in crime
item.description: How it started I’ve been alone for a while, and I’m getting old(30+), I started feeling the urge to have a “partner in crime”, AKA, feeling lonely. So I asked around, and people have always ask back “what kind of girl/partner are you looking for? " I hate not being able to articulate what I’m looking, so I decided to write it down, since there is nothing secretive about.
